metadata.title: ANWR Inholdings and Allotments
metadata.description: Data Type: Boundaries;   This dataset depicts native allotments and land inholdings in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. This data is an ARC/INFO polygon coverage in an Albers Equal Area projection. These data originated in the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Division of Realty.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: This dataset provides location of Native inholdings and allotments within the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
